name: MadScientistAlarm
0:
”Alexa, wake me up at 7:00 AM to mad scientist alarm tone”
”Alexa, set an alarm at 7:00 AM to mad scientist alarm tone”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mad scientist alarm
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hear three different mad scientist alarms in this crazy collection of sounds from a laboratory that has gone out of control! "Crazy Laboratory!" "Alien Invasion!" And everyone's favorite- "Tesla Coil!"

Get Mad Scientist Gold to unlock seven MORE mad scientist alarms including: "Insane Potions," "Disgusting Goop," "Murphy's Law," "Super Elastic Bubble Plastic," "Test Tube Fantasy," "Defective UFO," and the classic "Dumb Computer!"

FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT: If you enjoyed Mad Scientist Alarm, please leave us a review telling us what you love, and what alarms you want to hear next!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
